EmailTemplate.name: AB PreApproved Request Mail
EmailTemplate.subject: Your request {!Employee_Request__c.Name} has been approved.
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Dear {!User.FirstName}, Your access request named {!Employee_Request__c.Name} has been accepted and does not require further approval. Details: Office Location: {!Employee_Request__c.Location__c} Requested Date: {!Employee_Request__c.Date_of_Request__c} Requested Slot: {!Employee_Request__c.Requested_Slot__c} Please present the QRCode at the Office Reception: {!Employee_Request__c.QR_Code__c}
